title: Annual Acceptable Use Policy Review
description: A GRC analyst must conduct the annual review of the Acceptable Use Policy (AUP) and require all employees to re-acknowledge it.

tasks.description: Review the current AUP for any needed updates related to new technologies or social media platforms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst identifies that the policy needs a new section on the acceptable use of generative AI tools.

tasks.description: Draft the updated AUP and submit it for approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst creates and gets approval for the updated policy.

tasks.description: Launch a campaign requiring all employees to read and electronically sign the updated AUP within 30 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully manages the annual acknowledgement campaign.
